result.html: ceann scríbe londainDestination: London.

result.eng: I managed to reach my destination.
result.ga: d'éirigh liom mo cheann scríbe a bhaint amach
result.orig: d'éirigh liom mo cheann scríbe a bhaint amach
result.html: d'éirigh liom mo cheann scríbe a bhaint amachI managed to reach my destination.
result.ponchtml: d'éiriġ liom mo ċeann scríbe a ḃaint amaċI managed to reach my destination.

result.eng: By the time I had reached the destination I was tired.
result.ga: faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse orm
result.orig: faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse orm
result.html: faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse ormBy the time I had reached the destination I was tired.
result.ponchtml: faoin am a ẛroiċ mé an ceann scríbe ḃí tuirse ormBy the time I had reached the destination I was tired.

result.eng: I told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ga: dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.orig: dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.html: dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ponchtml: dúirt mé le mo ċoṁarsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aġaiḋ go dtí mo ċeann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
